casebody.data:
JUSTUS
v.
ROSNER, et al. 255A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 2, 2019 K. Edward Greene, Attorney at Law, Tobias S. Hampson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Rosner, Michael J. (M.D.), et al. Wade E. Byrd, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, for Justus, Billy Bruce.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of December 2018 by Tobias S. Hampson to Withdraw as Appellate Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of January 2019."
